CHRISTMAS GIVEAWAY- A Gift to Our Communities!🎄

This holiday season, we’ve teamed up with some incredible Aussie brands— @in2thewild.aus, @blundstoneau, and @surfolkau—to give one lucky adventurer the ultimate off-the-grid getaway!

Here’s your chance to escape the ordinary and reconnect with nature🌱

What’s included (giveaway pack valued at $1,500AUD) :
$500 Into The Wild Escapes Voucher
$500 clothing voucher from Ottway the Label
1 x pair of Blundstones
2 x film camera bundles from Surfolk (valued up to $500) 

How to enter:
1.    Follow: @ottway_thelabel , @in2thewild.aus, @blundstoneau & @surfolkau
2.    Share this giveaway post with your travel buddies.
3.    Tag who you’d bring on this adventure in the comments below (every tag = 1 entry).
4.    Drop your email into the giveaway link in our IG bios.

Adventure is calling—don’t miss out! Enter now for your chance to win. 

Winner announced Tuesday, 17 December 2024 (via email).

For more details, please read the full T&Cs in our Bio.
Good luck! 🙌🏽

Want to know a funny story? At OTTWAY we started this journey with only jackets and shorts, for years! Then we decided to design our first pair of pants (The Miller Pants) and since then, they have been a community favourite! Corduroy? Linen? Checkered? We now have it all 🙌🏽 

@javmiguens showing us the versatility of our pants range. Which is your favourite?

Let’s talk about what makes ‘ultimate comfort’ … 
The new Miller Pants are not only made from the softest eco-friendly bamboo fabric, but they are designed in a shape that is made for movement. We added an elastic waistband at the back and made sure the fit was breezy. You cant do much better then that!

〰️
First of all… this is scary! 
I’ve never been part of creating a clothing line before
& a question of doubt that has been popping up is;

- “What if I’m the only one who likes it?”

Feeling it a bit…
I’ve always tried to be careful with what I’m promoting
& if I do, I fully need to be able to stand behind it.

Also I know that the decisions I take in moments & in life
directly reflects my wellbeing & the direction I’ll walk
& I want nothing but greatness in my life.

This is why I took the decision to create this collection
together with my favorite brand @ottway_thelabel 
It feels so special sharing this with you🖤

It’s called Zephyr & I’m so grateful how it turned out!
You’ll find it on a link in my bio & in my stories.
Thanks for checking it out & love to you.
Lets dance in my outfit this time✨

🎶 Love Seeking - @mindagainst 🎶✨

Back in the days in the heart of every village, the town square was where the community gathered. People came to dance, to put up markets & to celebrate life. The last couple of months we’ve been realizing that these gatherings are so beautiful & important in this time as well.

Designing my own collection with @ottway_thelabel 🖤

I’ve always been picky with clothing

Asking my mom & dad they would probably say that I was quite a rebel growing up never listening to what they suggested in terms of clothing haha.

I love my mom & dad for being practical but I was always wondering why it cant be both practical & esthetic at the same time? Why we can’t match colors & mix comfortable with beautiful? 

A bunch of years back I found this brand I really loved called @ottway_thelabel they basically just started their journey & I really fell in love with their touch, felt like old vintage but was still new with lots of details. 

I fell in love with the founders too, Neri & Manu have this really gentle & humble way in communication. Their calmness, sense of details, quick transition to smiles & very light energy felt so close to the people I love to surround myself with, so felt really honored when they asked me to become an ambassador for their brand. 

They invited me to their wedding last year & as the only person there who never met the wedding couple in real life I felt nothing but home. It says so much about them❤️

Now creating this collection Zephyr with Ottway feels like a dream. It’s inspired by my last years here on Ibiza. 

Zephyr is this gentle, mild breeze that touches souls with its quiet magic, just like the people I love to surround myself with. It reminds us of the simple joys that surround us each day. It’s unisex & available in two colors, Rust & White. It’s beautifully flowy & perfect for those blissful beach days we cherish here!

I will add a link to the shirts in my BIO & on my stories🖤

Sending love
Linus

Hey there! Neri and Manu here - quick thoughts from the aeroplane ✈️
 
Let’s take a trip back to April 2018, when OTTWAY was just starting out. 

Picture this: two rookies in fashion, working from their cabin house, launching a website with only 3 unisex shirts… 

It was a humble beginning, with the constant question hanging over us...

“Will we run out of ideas?”

Fast forward to today, and we’re writing this from an aeroplane, exhausted from 10 days of intense creativity secluded in the mountains of China, designing new collections.

The good news? We’re full of exciting ideas, projects, and epic new designs

The bad news? After starting with just 3 designs, we never thought we were going to run out of space!

Despite producing always in small batches, every design needs its own space, and we need to make some room in our Collingwood warehouse to welcome the new pieces! 

As a thank you for being part of our journey, we’re giving our community 20%-50% off on over 30 timeless designs.

Once they’re gone, they’re gone! Don’t miss out!

Travelling around the US with our good friends @michelle.lawrencee and @nico.schroderr !

Best memories are always made on the road 🙌🏽

This is our reminder to SLOW DOWN 🖤

We explored inner China for the last couple of weeks and enjoyed “people-watching” when savouring an unhurried approach to life: Early morning fishing, at the markets, laundry chats, playing cards… 

Enjoy the beauty of being present in the here and now

#ottwaythelabel #slowliving #slowdown #movingpostcards

How it started vs how it’s going! 

At Ottway, we believe music is like medicine for the soul. Combine that with our passion for supporting local artists and live music, and you’ve got an Ottway Session!

Sometimes, it's more about the feeling than the experience. The Palmer makes no exception🙌🏼 ⁠
⁠
Crafted from soft 100% cotton, it's light as a breeze and takes you back to those untamed adventures. Roll up the sleeves, chase warm nights, embrace the carefree moments, and let the freedom sink in.

Top 5 spots to visit for the perfect day out in Bondi! 🌊

1. Start your morning right with a cozy brunch at @theshopandwinebar, where great coffee meets a laid-back atmosphere

2. Cool off with a dip at the iconic @icebergsclub pools. Nothing beats that fresh ocean water and panoramic views of Bondi Beach 

3. Treat yourself to @d.bowls famous Acai bowl- the perfect fuel for your beach day 

4. Don’t forget to swing by @ottway_thelabel at 📍129 Glenayr Ave to explore our range of vintage designs. You’ll find pieces that are just as timeless as Bondi itself.

5. Cap off your adventure with coffee and chill vibes at @thedepotbondi. It’s the perfect spot to relax, recharge, and soak in that Bondi energy.

Save this post for your next Bondi adventure!
Life feels simple and pure here🌱 thanks for the good times amigos! #tropicaldays #byronbay

Slow living in the North of Spain!⁠
⁠
Imagine life as a peaceful stroll through a beautiful garden in a valley nestled in the mountains of Northern Spain. A cosy little town with stone-built houses where there is no traffic, and you can pause to appreciate each flower and feel connected to the world around you. ⁠
⁠
We recently visited Charlie, Manu's uncle, and spent quality time embracing slow living, learning from nature, and savouring an unhurried approach to life. It felt so good!⁠
⁠
This is our reminder to slow down and enjoy the beauty of the present!⁠
⁠
Neri + Manu🤎

Back home and back in @twopalms_studio . Really enjoyed building this new piece out. I’ve been running my main pedalboard into the @hologram_electronics chroma console which has opened up so many doors sonically. Routing delays and reverbs into the texture module adds this expansive compression to those wet fx that is so dynamic and definitely inspired the main guitar part of this track. 

Also big shoutout to @moonmadefarms for lending me her wicked cool custom sitar guitar that’s also layered in there. Stoked to start adding that into the new @desertfriendsband album! 

Wearing @ottway_thelabel, a very rad Aussie brand from my dear friends @nerii_xx and @manu_lopezvelez. This is the 3rd installment of our Hi-Desert Tunes, stay tuned for more ✌🏼.

Although the sizing of both jackets is quite similar, their main differences are in shape and fit.🙌🏽

LIFE IS FOR LIVING: Our mantra always!🙌🏽⁠
Always enjoying the present moment, friends & outdoors with the aim of living an adventure near or far. How do you make the most of your days?

But why is our denim jacket unique to others?⁠
We put our non-negotiables onto paper and spent months ensuring we ticked them all off:⁠
1. The perfect boxy/slouchy fit ⁠
2. It had to be warm! We lined it with soft plaid cotton ⁠
3. With a unique touch! We added an embroidery slogan on the back ⁠
⁠
Trust us, you won't find another like it 🤎

This journey called OTTWAY, is all about chasing dreams together with good people, and seems like we have been busy the last years following the plan:

2019 - young Jian joins the team in Melbourne
2019 - middle of covid and we decided to get a warehouse space
2019 - from warehouse to Flagship Store
2020 - always creating
2020 - always having fun
2021 - West Coast becomes his new home 
2022 - tropical dream, lets move to Byron and open a new store
2023 - pinch me moment, the team together in Morocco
2023 - Lets open a store in Sydney, why not?
TODAY - we are a family, you are going to be missed!

TODAY ONLY GET A FREE NATURE CAP WITH ALL ORDERS OVER $100 and most importantly we’re encouraging you guys to spend more time outside and to take your work (if possible) outdoors for as long or little as you like!

FREE NATURE CAP when participating in our Earth Day campaign! 🌿🌏️⁠
We're encouraging you guys to spend more time outside and to take your work (if possible) outdoors for as long or little as you like!⁠
⁠
HOW?!:⁠
1. MAKE A PLAN to spend time in nature outside of your normal routine⁠
⁠
2. Take a pic or film a video to encourage others to participate and share it! Tag us or use the hashtag #LessWorriesMoreNature⁠
⁠
3. We'll THEN SEND YOU A UNIQUE CODE to get a FREE Nature Cap with your next purchase⁠
⁠
GO EVEN FURTHER: get inspired, step out into nature and use this audio on a reel to spread the concept even more!⁠
⁠
Let's raise awareness and conserve our beautiful Earth 🤎

In the lead up to Earth Day next week (22nd April), we’re encouraging you guys to spend more time outside and to take your work (if possible) outdoors for as long or little as you like!

It could look like:
- An entire day, morning or afternoon setup by the local park
- A phone call or meeting walking outdoors instead of the office
- Your lunch break spent outside, in a local park, a dip at the local beach or in your garden.
*Go a step further and remove all distractions and turn your phone off

OUR BELIEF IS: If people could just for one day or one moment, put aside some time within their regular routine to be in nature, to acknowledge and appreciate it, then we believe Earth Day is being utilised for what it’s meant for; to raise awareness and to conserve out beautiful Earth

How to get involved & join the Less Worries, More Nature club!
*by doing so you can get an OTTWAY limited edition, not-for-sale Nature Cap with your next Ottway purchase! 

This week, on Earth Day or any day after, MAKE A PLAN to spend time in nature outside of your normal routine. (Some tips below)

Take a pic or film a video to encourage others to participate and share it! Tag us or use the hashtag #LessWorriesMoreNature and we’ll repost it to share the message too! THEN SEND YOU A UNIQUE CODE to get a FREE Nature Cap with your next purchase (as seen in this reel)

GO EVEN FURTHER: get inspired, step out into nature and use this audio on a reel to spread the concept even more!

Have you met GLORIA? 🚌
Our 40ft 1970’s school bus helped us become self sustainable after many hard working years renovating this beauty out in the Otway Ranges 🤎

A strong point to being off-grid meant harvesting our own water and food. We collect water from the a-frame cabin roof and it fills a 5,000L tank which can be filtered and used for drinking and in the kitchen. Another addition is the 3x3 bathroom with a composting toilet and we use electricity from the solar panels to pump the water into the shower! 

We are super proud. 
A dream to reconnect with nature …

Rather than just another highlight reel... we thought let’s showcase the real moments of 2023 straight from our phone!!
It’s been a year of positive challenges, even tighter bonding, near death experiences and of course endless good times and travel! As always we hope it’s inspired something positive in your live’s! 

OTTWAY never started to simply sell clothing. We love our fashion, we believe in our wear quality and uniqueness but this journey began to create a community of adventure seeking, old tradition lovers and life livers! 

Thanks for being a part of this EPIC year and what’s in store for 24 is more than we’ve ever done before!

WHY THE NAME TORAT?⁠
A rich country with a long-standing culture, Morocco is home to vibrant preserved traditions through generations. Every festival, ritual, or special gathering is a symbol of the living arts in the country 🐫

THE AMAL DRESS 🤎⁠
100% woven cotton, thick fabric with a scoop neckline. Includes delicate frills along the bottom and sits just above the ankles for a maxi dress length. ⁠
This fabric transports you to the heart of Morocco where textured rugs, rolling dunes and bustling street markets inspired us!

Why Morocco? 🇲🇦 A desire to lose oneself in a cultural difference.⁠
⁠
Morocco's textures are a vibrant tapestry of the country's rich cultural heritage and natural landscapes. From the intricate patterns of traditional rugs to the weathered, textured walls of ancient medina cities, Morocco offers a sensory feast. The softness of desert sands, the chaos of spice markets, and the smooth, cool touch of handcrafted ceramics all contribute to the country's diverse and captivating textures, reflected in the fabrics we chose to use in our new collection ONLINE NOW 🙌🏽

📷 @daitonvike @marievike

INTRODUCING six textured, unique and timeless designs inspired from the landscape and culture of Morocco

From a long awaited desire to explore the far north-west Africa coast, the Ottway team followed an internal calling to delve deep into the lands unique foreign culture and landscape. From hidden oasis’s, bustling spice markets and endless dunes, this adventure left behind more than just a memorable experience. It taught us about ourselves and sparked the next chapter to the Ottway journey… it was as if written in the sands of Morocco all along, waiting for our discovery…
Written in Sand dropping tomorrow 🙌🏽 A special collection amongst good friends and blending in a new culture. Cant wait to share more… #comingsoon

Do you know the story behind the name of the RAREBIRD jacket? 🦅⁠
Named and designed honouring what’s believed as the rarest bird in the world, the Australian Night Parrot, the jackets back is shaped and adorned similar.⁠
⁠
To be a Rarebird means embracing what makes us unusual, uncommon and exceptional... and where is the best place to begin?⁠
⁠
Where we find our freedom! 🤎

The new Downtown...⁠
After almost a year since moving to the quieter coastal life of Byron Bay, we felt propelled to return to the roots of Ottway by exploring the nearest city; Brisbane. ⁠
Connecting with new friends and exploring new streets, high rises and the metropolitan overhead, we still found our vintage bearings in a new scene and designed a collection to fit just as well in suburbia, as it does in nature.⁠

Happy New Year Ottway fam!!⁠
As we embark onto our 5th year here at Ottway and are delving into some exciting planning and prep, we can't help but feel the love and appreciation for how this journey has evolved!⁠
Starting from our kitchen bench top and lounge room in south Melbourne with 3 unique shirt designs in 2018... to the incredible global community, offering almost an entire wardrobe of designs and an impactful sustainability program, we sit here writing these words feeling proud and motivated!⁠
⁠
To 2023 and another epic year of epic adventures, dream chasing and good times! Keep chasing and keep living! ⁠

A recap of another crazy year at Ottway! 
2022 saw some big steps, big moves and an even bigger Ottway community! Every bit of it made possible because of your guys constant support and trust in us!
SO THANK YOU! 🖤
To name some of the stand outs, this years highlights were;
- Hitting an amazing community of 100K on here
- Living an entire month off-grid in our converted school bus and tiny home; Gloria 🚌
- Launching and releasing a year long, 4 chapter campaign called “Art Of Living” where it took us full time into Ottway, escaping the ordinary at Gloria, across the world into the German wilderness, returning home and finding new appreciation for Melbourne and finally, chasing the dream of relocating to Byron Bay and setting up a new beginning! All inspired from our moto that “Life is for Living” and that there is an art to it! 
- Upgrading our Melbourne Flagship store to be double the size and launching the Byron Bay Cabin Store!
- Installing another 200 solar panels as part of our Solo Sunny Days sustainability Program

But above all, feeling more inspired, grateful and driven to keep this Ottway story going. Spreading our will for adventure, creativity, true craftsmanship and appreciation for old traditions!
Thanks for being a part of the journey and have a happy ne year!! Life is for Living!

Hey friends!

Ottway Byron Bay has officially opened its doors and we can't wait to meet you all!

We've poured our love and creativity into this space, turning it into more than just a store! A full immersion into the Ottway lifestyle!

One lucky winner will receive:

- a $500 in store Ottway voucher for our new Byron store
- 2 nights cabin accomodation at @saltycabins_ 
- A full indulge at Combi Byron Bay Cafe!

1️⃣ Comment who you'd bring to Byron!

2️⃣ Save this image

3️⃣ Share this post in your story

4️⃣ Make sure you are following @ottway_thelabel & @saltycabins_ & @wearecombi

Please keep an eye out for fake accounts as winners will only be contacted via @ottway_thelabel (our/their) only account) and we will never ask for personal or credit card details!

Art Of Living: Call Of The Wild collection now live!!
After re-desiging life, the next adventure for Ottway creators Neri and Manu was to listen to their call of the wild. An internal compass which took them 14,000km away deep into the Daaden forest, Germany. Staying in an original log cabin with local life artist Felix and Luisa, the four of them explored the area, listening to what kept secrets it entailed...
Shop the new collection while stock lasts!
Happy Adventuring fam 🙌🏽

SOLLER ~ Pronounced Soy-er and named after a once very isolated, yet widely known beautiful harbour town on the Spanish island of Mallorca. The history of Port de Sóller was one of resilience, isolation and rich seafaring/trade. The Soller shirt has many similarities. Made from a premium and unique Ramie fabric, it is a versatile long sleeve, in an oatmeal colourway designed to wade off sun and built to stand strong on it's own #shirt #jacket #slowfashion #unisex
We made it to Germany 🇩🇪 After popular demand we have decided to name it OTTO 🚐 🙌🏽 Thanks for being part of this journey!🤎 #otto #motorhome #ottwayeurope

If we could leave you with a gift, it's a message to chase your dreams! We began from a kitchen table and pantry storeroom - to our dream flagship store and office over the past four years. The story is far from over and can't wait to take you a long for what's to come!

EARTH DAY GIVEAWAY!!
**Competition closed! Congratulations @krispy_krit 🎉
In the lead up to Earth Day tomorrow, we are throwing a giveaway in appreciation for the home which has given us everything we have today!
Nature and the outdoors has played a huge role in our journey, inspiring much of our mission and the necessity of conserving all of its beauty is ever prominent!
We believe in order to protect something, you must spend time with it, appreciate and understand it.
That is why a core value of ours is to promote outdoors adventures, and so we are teaming up with @salty.aura and @home_camp, two other brands with a strong connection to nature and making positive change in the way they do business, to giveaway a prize that will get you out there and appreciating our home;Earth!

You could win!
- A $1000 4m Bell Tent
- $1000 Ottway The Label voucher
- $1000 Salty Aura voucher to spend on their new Sustainable Hemp bedding + recycled rugs

OTTWAY BEANIES RESTOCKED🙌🏽! The greatest addition to any outfit. It's carefully constructed in a burly rib knit, maintaining a cool shape and available in three timeless colours 🙌🏽 #beanies #restocked

They’ve been years in the making!! After all the times of being asked when is Ottway releasing a dress… Well here they are! 
Born from countless days searching narrow laneways of Western Europe, to across the globe in vintage Australian stores. The Yamba & Rossana dresses are our answer to years of yearning for the perfect, most versatile and trendless dress!

Wear them solo, under a Rarebird or with your favourite flanno!

Welcome to the Ottway warehouse Rossana & Yamba 👗

CHAPTER 1: Re-designing Life IS OFFICIALLY LIVE & ONLINE!
Introducing the
Yamba & Rossana dresses,
and the Jasper Cream & Brown.

Inspired by the necessity of simple, laid back living mixed with the comfort and style of easy wearing to match. It has always been about creating that balance between style, comfort and practicality, all the while feeling good and inspired to make the most of our days.
These four designs embody just that, and we hope they inspire you all to re-design your life into exactly how you imagine it!

The first chapter for us has been packing/selling everything and leaving the city life behind, going full time into our dream & mission: Ottway The Label and spending an entire month off grid at our sanctuary in the Otway Ranges, Gloria! 🚌

Find the first chapter: Re-designing life MANIFESTO in this video and online at
www.ottwaythelabel.com

Stay tuned for the next chapters and adventures! We have an exciting year ahead! 😉

Thanks team!! 🤎

SOLLER | Pronounced Soy-er and named after a once very isolated, yet widely known beautiful harbour town on the Spanish island of Mallorca. The history of Port de Sóller was one of resilience, isolation and rich seafaring/trade. The Soller shirt has many similarities. Made from a premium and unique Ramie fabric, it is a versatile long sleeve, in an oatmeal colourway designed to wade off sun and built to stand strong on it's own #shirt #jacket #unisex #madeinsmallbatches

WE HIT A 100K COMMUNITY! And while being larger than the MCG’s capacity is a milestone, it's not just about the numbers. Since Ottway started one of our main missions was to create an amazing community of like-minded legends. Whether you enjoy getting outside, chasing nature, having good times, adventures, promoting a sustainable future, being creative, fashion or old vintage traditions, all of you share at least something in common. To have 100K of you on here, following this journey is a huge milestone and we would love to have the opportunity of meeting you all in person one day! While this is a big dream, let's get started!

NOT JUST A HAPPY NEW YEARS!

As we sit here writing our 4th Happy New Years message, we can't help but reflect on all the good times that have been. While this year has been as challenging as the last, there has also been so many good memories. We've continued to build our community and more than ever we appreciate how much you all mean to Ottway. Without your ongoing support and belief in this story, it wouldn't exist at all!

With this first post of 2022, we want to leave you with a positive note to take into the new year.

Hey fam! Today is an important day for Ottway and the rest of the world! It marks International Day Of Climate Action and we have a message we want to spread far and wide, which truly hits close to home!

Recently, we were connected with climate change tackling organisation @surfersforclimate who filled us in on a recent devastating government released proposal which saw 31,000sq Km of pristine ocean to be sold off to the highest bidder for gas exploration in our backyard and the area which is the very inspiration for this project, The Otway’s.

As part of our action on this important day, we want to spread this news to as many people as possible and aid @surfersforclimate in collecting signatures for an opposing petition.

WE NEED YOUR HELP! Click the link in our story and add your signature, then to help us spread this message, share this post to your stories. For every share we will donate $1 to @surfersforchange so that they can continue to kick gas out of the line-up and protect our oceanic backyard!

HELP US PROTECT OUR BACKYARD!
Share this post and sign the petition!

Oil and Gas

Introducing The Bransby!
An exciting new pop up collaboration with good friend @rahneebransby

Combine her trendless known styling and creativity, The Bransby is, dare we say, our most unique flanno yet!

The name R&G Mustard came from the inventors behind its colour. Brothers Robert and George French experimented with the rootstock of the turmeric plant, adding it to the traditional brown mustard recipe, resulting in the yellow mustard being born ☝🏽📷 @haydenseyes

What a year of big unknown’s! A quick recap of all that 2020 entailed!

There certainly isn’t enough time to capture all the crazy, good and exciting times it threw our way but as we begin the new year, we wanted to review the past 12 months…Our core pursuits focussing around: sustainability, community, flagship store and our #BeARarebird campaign based on finding freedom 🙌🏽 

Big thanks to everyone of you involved and here’s to another year of good times! ❤️

Turn off your engine. Close your eyes..⁠.True to what Ottway is all about, we wanted these to be timeless, unisex, all season, durable yet comfortable and all the while telling a story beyond its style. It fell oddly into timely unison…
Here in Victoria, we’ve found ourselves for most of the year actually being inside… and it sparked in us an appreciation for how important the outside is! #outsideisbetter #newcampaign #newcollection

That feeling of switching off, putting your hands to work, enjoying the simple things and being left in awe of nature. ⁠
It's an amazing thing, that when you don't have something, you appreciate it even more. ⁠
Here's to plenty more good times to come and being outside 🙌🏽⁠
The Stedman and Ries from out just dropped new collection "outside is better" 🙌🏽 #newcollection #jackets #flannel #cord #unisexclothing

NOW AVAILABLE ONLINE!⁠
Our latest collection just dropped!⁠
We chose to connect this three piece, unisex, seasonless collection around one of the very necessities we've learnt to appreciate most this year: The outside. That of a more simple, easy life. Where worries are less, enjoyment abundant and appreciation for nature high. ⁠
There is a lot to be said, but more to feel from being outside ✌🏾⁠

With the the arrival of the Black edition, the Rarebirds became a pair.
Linked to their rarity, is the feeling we all hold so valuable, and a trait, we all possess: Freedom 

A few weeks back, we asked you guys where you find yours:
In nature, with loved ones, the ocean, among friends, on the road, travelling…
To feel free is to be you. To be you is to
embrace the unique rarity we all have within us.
Take a step towards your freedom: Be a Rarebird 🦅

Big THANK YOU to all our amazing friends who shared their freedom with us🖤

The Rarebird story... It wouldn’t make sense without returning to the beginning. The original Rarebird Jacket.

As with all good stories, this one started with adventure and searching for that something which is special…
Named and designed honouring what’s believed as the rarest bird in the world, the Australian Night Parrot, the jacket's back is shaped and adorned similarly.
Unusual, uncommon and exceptional, it pays tribute to the rarest of the rare…

Stay tuned! Tomorrow, all Rarebirds will be arriving and available! 🙌🏽

The Westward venturing out for a morning dip 🌊 📷 @nathan.lapham

“More often than not, sunsets over west are always unforgettable. There is something magical about the sun setting directly over the coastlines horizon. The water sparkles in a hued warmth and that moment seconds before the sun dips away, when it luminates at its largest, spreading an array of colours across the sky, filled us too with warmth and joy. It fell perfectly for my last night here. A group of close friends grabbed their cameras, a couch and we sat up on our favourite rooftop looking over the main street of Fremantle. Reminiscing on what a summer it had been, and cheers’ing to many more of these good times”
Last night over West - A story and words by @journal_of_jian

Fremantle Cabin Session Update 📻 Dear West Coast Ottway Crew, we are sure you are well aware of the current COVID-19 pandemic which is affecting the world. It is a hot topic flooding our lives and for many beginning to have an impact.

Here at Ottway the Label we have our customers - you guys - at the priority of our thoughts. We want to give you all an incredible, fun, memorable experience of live music and the Ottway lifestyle. With our upcoming cabin session event next Friday the 27th March, the current precautionary measures being taken to ensure the prevention of spreading the virus, has given us some concern for the likelihood of this event occurring.

At this stage, unfortunately, the event is going to be POSTPONED. We care deeply for the enjoyment and safety of you guys. This session was something we were looking very forward to... The event is going to be moved to a later, safer, date and of course, full refunds will be issued and previous ticket purchasers will be notified first of the new date.  For now, stay tuned for further notice and take care of each other!

Ottway fam 🖤 📷 @caveman.creative

After several months working on our sustainability program, we are very happy to finally share it with you all. 
Being a small business, we have been assessing different angles to find the most efficient way of providing a positive impact to the community. 
Renewable energy, and more specifically Solar Energy, is what originally brought us to Australia. 
At OTTWAY, we are proud to promote a sustainable future by donating funds from every purchase towards the installation of solar power in community-owned projects around Australia. 
Thank you for your contribution so far, check our full sustainability program on our website and see what we have already achieved together. #cleanenergy #sustainability #yourcontribution #solarenergy #renewableenergy #community

Environment: A non-negotiable agenda

Ever since coal was partnered with water to generate steam and launch the industrial revolution, we have been pouring billions of tons of atmospheric warming compounds into the planet’s atmosphere. While scientists were aware of the climate-altering potential of burning hydrocarbons as early as 1896, the wealth generated by spinning jennies, power looms, and drop forges was seductive, as was the power it gave countries to build colonial empires and subjugate populations across the globe.

But the bill is finally coming due. 
At Ottway, we are committed to being part of a sustainable future and we have been working hard to implement an innovative and powerful giving back program that will be in place in the next coming weeks.

#climatechange #renewableenergy

THE OTTWAY BUS - MEET GLORIA 🚌  After the sad demolition of The Ottway Cabin...We dreamt of taking The Ottway Cabin into its natural environment, the Otway Ranges, down the Great Ocean Road… and it’s happening!

We are going off-the-grid in the heart of Otway’s, and rebuilding The Ottway Cabin on top of a 50 passenger school bus.

It is going to be a community project built together with our very good mates and all-year-round happy humans, @trentnattrass and @skyeinatent 
The dream is to reconnect with nature and continue with the Ottway Sessions bringing them to the next level… filling this unique space with music, laughter and the best vibes. To not only remember and record, but also to celebrate with our people.

Welcome to The Ottway Bus, aka Gloria
Let's keep the story going
Stay tuned… #theottwaybus #gloria #happytimes 🎥 @jkinphotos

Everything comes and goes, but nostalgia is hitting hard right now… The Ottway Cabin is sadly about to be demolished to give rise to brand new apartments. 
This unique nook means a lot to us, as it has not only been home for the last few years but also source of inspiration and birthplace for this project. We can’t be anything, but forever happy to all the good times and memories shared with all of you… 
During a time of high-speed urban, technological and de-humanization evolution, at Ottway we believe in preserving our past and re-connecting with nature. 
There are certain things in this world that money can’t buy. One of them is the ability to turn a vision into reality. We once dreamt of taking The Ottway Cabin into its natural environment, the Otway Ranges…and its happening!! We are going off-the-grid in the heart of the Otways, and rebuilding The Ottway Cabin on top of a 50 passenger school bus with the pieces of the original cabin before its demolished. To not only remember and record but also to celebrate with our people. It is going to be an epic journey, can’t wait to share it with you all... Thanks everyone for bringing the best vibes to our Cabin! 🖤

Let’s keep the story going,

Pacific Diary | Now Available ⚓️ Seafarers, ordinary men living extraordinary lives, subject to dangers and difficulties we could only imagine. The image of the true sea dog, the old salt, has something of the ultimate man, the first and last about it. We do not see sea captains these days. He has become a story-book figure, the Old Man retired to land. "As the ships cross seas of history, seafarers unfold the stories" 📷 @daitonvike 
#summercollection #pacificdiary #shortsleeveshirts #navyshirt #creamshirt

To leave the land, to know ships and sailors and their stories, to see the oceans in their vastness, to discover countries from their wharves inwards – what a dream!

We are so stocked to introduce you Pacific Diary tomorrow, our summer collection inspired by the ancient mariners. 
Thanks to everyone who has helped us bring together this dream. 📷 @daitonvike
💎 @marievike ⚓️ @amberauffray ⚓️ @tallandcurly

After months of hard work, it is time to officially announce the Rarebird Jacket…
This jacket pays tribute to the rarest of the rare. With its back shaped and adorned like a bird, this jacket draws similarities with one of the World’s rarest species, the Night Parrot. Living in the remote Australian desert, these Rarebirds has been secretly carrying out their lives unbeknownst to man for over a century. What was considered extinct has now been found. As with all good stories, this one started with adventure and searching for that something which is special… so go out and get looking, you never know what you might discover! 🎥 @fxgraphic thanks mate for this piece of art! #ottwaythelabel #thenewold
